akn:section.akn:heading: Strategy for improving post-consumer materials management and water management

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 4281. Strategy for improving post-consumer materials management and water management(a) In generalNot later than 1 year after December 18, 2020, the EPA Administrator shall, in consultation with stakeholders, develop a strategy to improve post-consumer materials management and infrastructure for the purpose of reducing plastic waste and other post-consumer materials in waterways and oceans.
(b) ReleaseOn development of the strategy under subsection (a), the EPA Administrator shall—(1) distribute the strategy to States; and
(2) make the strategy publicly available, including for use by—(A) for-profit private entities involved in post-consumer materials management; and
(B) other nongovernmental entities.
(Pub. L. 116–224, title III, § 301, Dec. 18, 2020, 134 Stat. 1092.)
